Lucfreelance

Web / app developer

Hello! I'm Lucas, a web developer capable to build websites with modern JavaScript web / app designs tools , plus adyacent technologies. Start a conversation with me (on English or Spanish) if you need a hand on a code, or get help for some dedicated digital request on PERNstack / JAMstack. Did you need an Astro, Vite, Hugo, Elevently, Bootstrap, Jekyll and more, includying why not, vanilla. Besides work with apiREST, databases, testing, integrations… I feel confortable with remote work. I also enjoy to write in soelucas.wordpress.com
